lines.text: Konga! Put me down! Konga! Put me down!
Fantastic... There's a huge monster gorilla that's constantly growing to outlandish proportions loose in the streets!

[after shooting his cat twice with a pistol]
Even those few drops might have made Tabby swell up to huge proportions!
There's danger in that hungry plant... It thrives on meat!

[to Dr. Decker over breakfast]
What are you having with your poached egg? Murder?
Margaret, I can't stand hysterics. Especially in the morning.
Please leave, I want to be alone with Konga.
Follow this light, it will help you concentrate.
